Package jGame.loop.render

this contains many things for game rendering, read these if you have some bug in your graphic

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Camera
    this is a class for camera controlling PLEASE handle the stat "CAMERA_READY"
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CameraImpl
    make the Camera
    NonCamera
    if you don't want to use the camera, you can just use this and the camera will not work at all
    Render
    the render, graphic control of the game
    RenderImpl
    the simple render implement

Package jGame.loop.render Description

this contains many things for game rendering, read these if you have some bug in your graphic
